original: Saraṇaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saraṇaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: saraṇam anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Saraṇaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: saraṇam paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaccuppannārammaṇo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā araṇam paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
